snippet: State health officials closed an oyster harvesting area and ordered a recall of oysters taken there since April 26 after 14 people became ill with norovirus.
abstract: Louisiana health officials close a New Orleans oyster harvesting area and order a recall of oysters taken there since April 26 after 14 people became ill with norovirus.
lead_paragraph: State health officials closed an oyster harvesting area and ordered a recall of oysters taken there since April 26 after 14 people became ill with norovirus.
